item.title: 即使关门很快结束，美联储 12 月利率决定也不会轻易作出
item.description: 由于美国政府关门，美联储官员不得不在没有关键经济统计数据的情况下做出最新的利率决定。政府重新开放后，他们将收到的数据可能不会让下一次决定变得更容易。【原文：Federal Reserve officials had to make their latest interest-rate decision without key economic statistics thanks to the US government shutdown. The data they will receive when the government reopens probably won’t make the next decision any easier.】

item.title: 股票和信贷投资者对人工智能的疑虑日渐加深
item.description:
围绕人工智能的乐观情绪提振了科技股。但是，由于公司正在利用信贷市场借贷现金，投资者变得越来越谨慎。【原文：

Optimism around AI has boosted tech stocks. But investors are growing cautious now that companies are tapping credit markets to borrow cash. 

】

item.title: 人工智能对决：美国和中国的差距
item.description: 美国掀起人工智能热潮已有近三年时间，而世界上大多数国家仍在努力追赶。只有一个国家在人工智能发展方面接近美国：中国。【原文：It’s been almost three years since the US kicked off the artificial intelligence boom, and most of the world is still trying to catch up. Only one country is close to matching the US in AI development: China.】

item.title: 芯片流动为荷兰逆转敞开大门，Nexperia 争端缓和
item.description: 中国允许荷兰芯片制造商 Nexperia 再次出口，为荷兰暂停对这家中资企业的权力创造了条件。【原文：China is allowing Dutch chipmaker Nexperia to export again, setting the stage for the Netherlands to suspend its powers over the Chinese-owned company.】

item.title: 股市面临 "临界点"，关键阈值面临考验
item.description: 美国股市突然动荡不安，交易员们纷纷研究技术图表，以寻找最新一轮抛售可能在何处停滞的线索。【原文：A suddenly turbulent US equity market has traders studying technical charts for clues on where the latest bout of selling might stall out.】

item.title: 中国解除对巴西家禽的禁令，结束长达五个月的停滞期
item.description: 中国已经取消了长达数月的从巴西进口家禽的禁令，此举有望重振中国从世界第一大肉类运输国的采购。【原文：China has lifted a months-long ban on poultry imports from Brazil, a move that’s poised to revive purchases from the world’s top shipper of the meat.】

item.title: 加密货币熊市几乎抹去了 2025 年的全部价值增长
item.description: 仅用了一个多月的时间，加密货币就抹去了今年几乎所有的市值涨幅。【原文：It took just over a month for cryptocurrencies to erase almost all of this year’s market value gains.】

item.title: 以美国为支点，玻利维亚重新思考与中国和俄罗斯的锂矿交易
item.description: 玻利维亚盛产电池金属锂，但这些资源几乎都被埋藏在地下。【原文：Bolivia is awash in the battery metal lithium, but the resource is nearly all trapped underground.】

item.title: 迪拜烟壶制造商 AIR 将与 Cantor SPAC 合并上市
item.description: 水烟品牌 Al Fakher 的所有者 AIR 有限公司计划通过与 Cantor Fitzgerald 支持的空白支票工具合并，于明年上半年在美国上市。【原文：AIR Ltd., the owner of hookah brand Al Fakher, is planning to list in the US in the first half of next year through a merger with a blank check vehicle backed by Cantor Fitzgerald.】

item.title: 中国市场无视全球避险情绪，彰显信心
item.description: 本周，中国资产表现出令人印象深刻的韧性，无视全球风险偏好的回落，表明投资者对世界第二大经济体的信心不断增强。【原文：Chinese assets showed impressive resilience this week, defying a global pullback in risk appetite and signaling growing investor confidence in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 在欧尔班与特朗普会晤之前，莫尔将工作重心从俄罗斯石油转移到其他国家
item.description: 匈牙利唯一的炼油厂表示，它可以从非俄罗斯来源采购大部分原油，这标志着在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和总理维克托-欧尔班就俄罗斯石油制裁问题举行高风险会晤之前，匈牙利的基调发生了转变。【原文：Hungary’s sole refiner said it can procure most of its crude from non-Russian sources, marking a shift in tone ahead of a high-stakes meeting between US President Donald Trump and Prime Minister Viktor Orban on Russian oil sanctions.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）会谈暂停且未达成新协议后，塞内加尔欧洲债券暴跌
item.description: 在国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）对塞内加尔为期两周的工作人员访问结束后，塞内加尔的美元债券创下了七个月来的最大跌幅。【原文：Senegal’s dollar bonds slumped the most in seven months after the International Monetary Fund’s two-week staff mission to the country ended without an agreement on a new program.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片热潮推动台湾实现 15 年来最快出口增长
item.description: 台湾的出口以 2010 年以来最快的速度激增，因为台湾经济抓住了全球对为人工智能提供动力的半导体的无底需求。【原文：Taiwan’s exports surged at the fastest pace since 2010 as the economy cashes in on bottomless global demand for semiconductors powering artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 贸易受阻，载有俄罗斯石油的船只罕见地驶离印度海域
item.description: 在特朗普政府加紧审查印度与俄罗斯的石油贸易之际，一艘载有来自最近受到制裁的俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）原油的油轮在孟买附近海域进行了一次罕见的货物转运。【原文：A tanker carrying crude from recently-sanctioned Rosneft PJSC has made a rare cargo transfer off Mumbai, as the Trump administration ramps up its scrutiny of India’s oil trade with Russia.】

item.title: 关于美国劳动力市场恶化状况的更多信息
item.description:
没有就业报告的就业插曲。【原文：

A jobs episode in absence of a jobs report.

】

item.title: 关于劳动力市场恶化状况的更多信息（播客）
item.description: 如果政府开放，我们今天就会收到一份就业报告。但现在，我们正处于官方经济数据封锁的状态。这是不幸的，因为经济已经处于一个非常混乱的境地，所以现在任何额外的数据都将非常有助于弄清事情的走向。在非农数据缺席的情况下，我们与彭博社观点专栏作家康纳-森（Conor Sen）就劳动力市场日益恶化的状况进行了讨论，以及他为什么认为美联储需要介入的原因【原文：If the government were open, we’d be getting a jobs report today. But as it is, we’re in this blackout of official economic data. That’s unfortunate, because the economy is already in a very confusing spot, and so any additional data right now would be very helpful in figuring out where things are heading. In the absence of Non-Farm Payrolls, we talked with Bloomberg Opinion columnist Conor Sen about the worsening state of the labor market, and why he thinks the Federal Reserve needs to step in】

item.title: Rightmove 股价因指导意见和人工智能支出创历史最大跌幅
item.description: Rightmove Plc 公布了加大人工智能投资的计划，并警告称 2026 年收入增长可能持平，该公司股价创下历史最大跌幅。【原文：Shares of Rightmove Plc tumbled the most on record after the company warned that revenue growth was likely to be flat in 2026 as it unveiled plans to boost investment in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 排名显示，迪拜超越纽约成为全球精英的最佳聚集地
item.description: 对于世界上的富人来说，没有比迪拜更适合的地方了。【原文：For the world’s rich, there’s no location more accommodating than Dubai.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行将 2026 年底通胀目标维持在 16
item.description: 土耳其中央银行维持了明年的通胀目标，这一雄心勃勃的举动表明它将在更长时间内维持高利率。【原文：Turkey’s central bank maintained its inflation target for next year in an ambitious move that signals it will keep interest rates high for longer.】

item.title: 菲律宾经济增长大幅放缓，股市跌至三年低点
item.description: 菲律宾经济增长急剧放缓，加深了人们对今年表现最差的市场之一的悲观情绪，菲律宾股市跌至多年低点。【原文：Philippine stocks fell to multi-year lows after a sharp slowdown in economic growth deepened pessimism toward one of this year’s worst-performing markets.】

item.title: 监管机构称印度将从减少银行限制中获益
item.description: 印度监管机构周五表示，印度央行正在考虑放宽对贷款机构的规定，因为近年来盈利能力和资产质量有所改善，使贷款机构能够建立足够的缓冲资本以克服风险。【原文：India’s central bank is considering easing rules for lenders, the regulator said on Friday, as profitability and asset quality have improved in recent years, allowing them to build adequate capital buffers to overcome risks.】

item.title: 英国航空公司老板称跨大西洋航线疲软影响销售额
item.description: 英国航空公司（British Airways）的母公司 IAG SA 表示，其重要的北大西洋航线在第三季度出现了一些疲软，导致盈利不及预期，股价也创下了自 4 月份以来的最大跌幅。【原文：British Airways parent IAG SA said its all-important North Atlantic route experienced some weakness in the third quarter, weighing on earnings that missed estimates and causing the stock to drop the most since April.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯称，英国房价在预算案公布前创下历史新高
item.description: 据英国最大的抵押贷款机构之一称，英国房价在 10 月份创下了历史新高，这表明尽管在工党政府秋季预算案出台前对房产税的猜测不断升温，但市场仍具有活力。【原文：UK house prices reached a fresh record high in October, according to one of the country’s largest mortgage lenders, a sign of a resilient market despite mounting speculation over property taxes ahead of the Labour government’s autumn budget.】

item.title: 如果恢复芯片供应，荷兰准备放弃对 Nexperia 的控制
item.description: 荷兰准备暂停执行一项所谓的部长令，该命令赋予荷兰对中资芯片制造商耐克斯派瑞公司（Nexperia）的控制权。【原文：The Netherlands is prepared to suspend a so-called ministerial order that gave it control over Chinese-owned chipmaker Nexperia in a move that would de-escalate a fight with Beijing that threatens to disrupt automotive production around the world.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称未计划向中国出货 Blackwell AI 芯片
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）表示，该公司并没有积极讨论向中国企业出售其 Blackwell AI 芯片的事宜，从而撇清了该公司试图重返全球最大半导体市场的猜测。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang said his company isn’t in active discussions to sell its Blackwell AI chips to Chinese firms, waving off speculation it’s trying to engineer a return to the world’s largest semiconductor market.】

item.title: 日本奥林巴斯在全球大调整中裁员 2000 人
item.description: 奥林巴斯公司（Olympus Corp. ）表示，该公司将裁员约 2000 人，占员工总数的 7%，以精简日本公司的结构，加快全球决策速度。【原文：Olympus Corp. said it’s cutting roughly 2,000 jobs, representing 7% of headcount, in a bid to streamline the Japanese company’s structure and speed up decision making globally.】

item.title: 印度黄金 ETF 因金银近期反弹而创下资金流入纪录
item.description: 据世界黄金协会的一份报告称，印度的黄金交易所交易基金正在创纪录地流入资金，今年的购买量已接近 30 亿美元，相当于约 26 吨贵金属。【原文：Gold exchange-traded funds in India are heading for record inflows, with this year’s purchases already close to $3 billion and translating to about 26 tons of the precious metal, according to a World Gold Council report.】

item.title: 日元疲软，股票上涨，GPIF 创 2024 年 3 月以来最佳业绩
item.description: 日本政府养老金投资基金创下了截至 2024 年 3 月的季度以来的最佳业绩，全球股市和有利的汇率波动提高了回报率。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund notched its best performance since the quarter ended March 2024, with global equities and favorable currency swings boosting returns.】

item.title: 越南咖啡种植大省躲过最严重台风袭击
item.description: 越南最大的咖啡生产省份达乐似乎躲过了台风 "卡尔梅吉 "最严重的袭击。【原文：Vietnam’s biggest coffee-producing province of Dak Lak appears to have dodged the worst of Typhoon Kalmaegi, according to initial assessments by an industry group after the storm made landfall overnight.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：股市在本周震荡下跌后保持稳定
